## Config.SystemConfiguration.create() method

Creates a new [SystemConfiguration](./ts-res.config.systemconfiguration.md) from the supplied [system configuration](./ts-res.config.model.isystemconfiguration.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static create(config: ISystemConfiguration, initParams?: ISystemConfigurationInitParams): Result<SystemConfiguration>;
```
